post_title: FS: T206 Jack Powell [EPDG - Price Drop 4.15.2024]
post_content:
Available for sale is the following card:

T206 Jack Powell (Horizontal/EPDG) - SOLD

Please add $5 for shipping and postage.

If you want to purchase this card:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
